title: To Riot
body:
I just wanted to say that I like your game.... You guys don't seem to hear that on the boards enough.
Thanks for 7.5 years of fun, and even more to come.
We have a friend group of 20 people who play league, we usually do customs against each other, but it brings us all together.
A sincere shoutout to you guys and one of my favorite games from all 20 of us!

replies.body:
Thanks, Brolaf and friends! This always means a lot. (Especially when working late like now. It really fuels me to keep going ^^)

And not just to me, but everyone here at Riot.
 
 http://imgur.com/DT4uzXx

If you and your buds have the time or need an extra, I'd love to ~~feed in~~ jump into one of your customs!
